author: Jonathan Shieber
title: U.S. markets shrug off record unemployment numbers as tech shares rise
description: Despite reports of historic unemployment with roughly 6.6 million Americans filing for unemployment, domestic stocks rose during regular trading today. One day after grim estimates on the potential death toll from the COVID-19 epidemic in the US sent stocks t…
content:
